column4: well installed 11.10 and in etc/x11 there was no xorg file so but my old xorg.conf for my Samsung monitor there. Isn't there really way to revert that some how?
Did you install 11.10 fresh or did you upgrade?
Also, are you saying there was no xorg.conf file right after you finished installation?
So it boots and you can log in, but it was at a low resolution? What kind of video card do you have?
What is the model of your laptop?
There is more than one Sony Vaio.
Have you tried changing the resolution with the display tool?
Have you installed ubuntu yet or are you trying to boot from the live cd?
So it worked when you booted from the live cd but it doesn't work now. What have you done since you installed it?
I installed it for while ago so I wanted to get my big screen working normally and i but my custom xorg.conf into x11 after reboot that happened
